name: ALONE II - Horror
description:
[ Alone ] is a StoryLine Horror game where you have to solve puzzles and leave the area as fast as possible?

       In the previous Chapter he leaved the house!! Now he think that the outside has not that safe anymore. he call his friend and decide to go to his house who live near her hometown.but the main problem is he don't know where i'm?

  • Playtime:   20  - 50 mins!
  • Control:   [ ASWD ].
  • Interaction:  [ E ].
  • In-Game tutorial.

Solve puzzles and collect stuffs to unlock the house and find the key for the car to go in his friend town.

The game contains flashing lights,JumpScars and extreme gore which some audiences might find disturbing.

Creators:

Nishad

Nihad ( brother ).
